meanings.definition: Capable of being executed or carried out.
meanings.sent1: The instructions were clear and the task was easily executable.
meanings.sent2: The project plan was executable within the given timeframe.
meanings.sent3: It was a simple and executable idea for the school fundraiser.
meanings.sent4: Her plan was as executable as a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The executable solution saved the team a lot of time and effort.

meanings.definition: A file that can be run or executed by a computer.
meanings.sent1: Make sure to download the executables for the software to work properly.
meanings.sent2: The executables were stored in a separate folder for easy access.
meanings.sent3: The computer was overloaded with unnecessary executables.
meanings.sent4: The executables acted as the backbone of the program.
meanings.sent5: He organized the executables neatly to avoid confusion.
